org.athrun.android.framework
类 AthrunTestCase

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          android.test.InstrumentationTestCase
              android.test.ActivityTestCase
                  android.test.ActivityInstrumentationTestCase2
                      org.athrun.android.framework.AthrunTestCase
所有已实现的接口：
junit.framework.Test
public class AthrunTestCase
extends android.test.ActivityInstrumentationTestCase2

Extends this class to use Athrun. If your app overrides onDestroy() method of the main Activity, and adds code like this:

android.os.Process.killProcess(android.os.Process.myPid());

You will encounter a process crash error when you run your test, to resolve this, override the tearDown() method in your test class which extends form TmtsTestCase, just make it to be an empty method and run test methods one by one.

作者：
taichan, bingyang.djj

findElementById

public <T> T findElementById(int id,
                             java.lang.Class<T> returnType)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Return an instance of ViewElement or its subclass by the given id and return type. It is strongly recommended you to use this API in such way:

1.Add a new package in test project's src folder, this package must has the same package name as the app's R.java has.

2.Copy the R.java from app's gen folder into the package founded in step 1.

3.When the App has been changed, do not forget to update R.java in test project.

Now you can use this API in this way: findElementById(R.id.yourId, ViewElement.class).

类型参数：
T - The ViewElement or its subclass.
参数：
id - Int value of view's id.
returnType - The ViewElement or its subclass, this parameter determines the return type of this method.
返回：
The ViewElement or its subclass.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

findElementById

public ViewElement findElementById(int id,
                                   int index)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

                            throws java.lang.Exception

返回：
The ViewElement.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

类型参数：
T - The ViewElement or its subclass.
参数：
literalId - String name of view id, the string after @+id/ defined in layout files.
returnType - The ViewElement or its subclass, this parameter determines the return type of this method.
返回：
The ViewElement or its subclass.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

findElementByIndex

public <T extends ViewElement> T findElementByIndex(int index,
                                                    java.lang.Class<? extends android.view.View> view,
                                                    java.lang.Class<T> returnType)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
Return an instance of ViewElement or its subclass by index.

类型参数：
T -
参数：
index -
view - Original type of view you want to get, it should be View or its subclass, this param must be exact.
returnType - The ViewElement or its subclass, this parameter determines the return type of this method.
返回：
Instance of ViewElement or its subclass.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

setMaxTimeToFindView

public static void setMaxTimeToFindView(int maxTime)
Set max time to find view, default time is 5000ms. If a view can not be found in this time, the test will fail.

参数：
maxTime - Time in milliseconds.

getStringById

public java.lang.String getStringById(java.lang.String name)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Get string value by id from res/values/strings.xml of the app under test.

参数：
name - Id of the string resource, the name attribute of string node defined in android xml files.
返回：
String value of the string resource.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

getCurrentActivityNameAcrossApp

public java.lang.String getCurrentActivityNameAcrossApp()
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
get the activity name that display in the front screen. resolve the problem activity name is wrong when crossing application. note: maybe need adding android.permission.GET_TASKS in AndroidManifest.xml of application under test 2011/12/08

返回：
activityName see as this type "com.android.browser.BrowserActivity"
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
